detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1))) % 20 + 1 (other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette.sol#16):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in CryptoRoulette.play(uint256) (other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette.sol#18-29):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette.sol#25)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastPlayed = now (other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette.sol#28)
	- shuffle() (other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette.sol#27)
		- secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1))) % 20 + 1 (other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette.sol#16)
